lines.dialogue: Still nothing no? No hint of action, no spark of motion? No desire at all for lever-pulling success? No...? That is a shame, track 2 will be very disappointed. I can see it now, drinking those martinis on its own. How can railway track drink? I don't know, but it's managing.
lines.instruction: Press enter to attempt to observe anything other than white text though the black void of your existence...

lines.dialogue: Well... If longer time didn't do it than maybe the opposite? Maybe you thrive under pressure, lets try this?
lines.instruction: Press enter to wonder why this being is still trying to get you to move...
